title: La Catrina Video Workbook
description: To purchase or download a workbook, click on the ‘Purchase or Download’ button to the left. To purchase a workbook, enter the desired quantity and click ‘Add to Cart’. To download a free workbook, right click the ‘FREE Download PDF’ link and save to your computer. This will result in a faster download, as opposed to left clicking and opening the link.
author: David Curland
